breakingthrough.name: breakingthrough
breakingthrough.title: breaking through
breakingthrough.description: A digital series featuring six female athletes at the top of the action sports world
breakingthrough.overview: Create a visual interpretation of the film, Far Out. Each film process starts with a movie poster. From that, the project takes life and evolves into an all encompassing campaign - print & digital. From magazine ads to motion graphics, we intended to capture the essence of Far Out.

journey.name: journey
journey.title: journey > reward
journey.description: Jeremy Jones & Selema Masekela discuss sports, the environment and social justice
journey.overview: The Journey Is Greater Than the Reward aims to have an honest discussion with Jeremy Jones and Selema Masekela. Set as a very conversationally styled interview, Jeremy and Selema dive deep into their most memorable moments from their careers while discussing topics close to the heart. Covering the origins of their careers, lessons learned, racial inequality in action sports, climate change, and much more.
